Description: Module for next generation sequencing assays
A platform is an object aggregate that is the set of instruments and software needed to perform a process [OBI_0000050]. Specific model of the sequencing instrument.
Valid Values: Illumina Next Seq 500, Illumina Next Seq 550, Illumina Next Seq 2500, Illumina NovaSeq 6000,  Illumina MiSeq, 454 GS FLX Titanium, AB SOLiD 4 AB SOLiD 2, AB SOLiD 3, Complete Genomics, Illumina HiSeq X Ten, Illumina HiSeq X Five, Illumina Genome Analyzer II, Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx, Illumina HiSeq 2000, Illumina HiSeq 2500, Illumina HiSeq 4000, Illumina MiSeq, Illumina NextSeq, Ion Torrent PGM, Ion Torrent Proton, Ion Torrent S5, PacBio RS, NovaSeq 6000, NovaSeqS4, Ultima Genomics UG100, Oxford Nanopore minION, GridION, PromethION, PacBio Sequel2, Revio, Other, unknown, Not Reported

Description: Process which results in the creation of a library from fragments of DNA using cloning vectors or oligonucleotides with the role of adaptors [OBI_0000711]
Valid Values: Smart-seq2, Smart-SeqV4, 10xV1.0, 10xV1.1, 10xV2, 10xV3,10xV3.1, CEL-seq2, Drop-seq, inDropsV2, inDropsV3, TruDrop, sci-ATAC-seq

Description: The source of the input nucleic molecule
Valid Values: Single Cell, Bulk Whole Cell, Single Nucleus, Bulk Nuclei

Description: Read 1 content description
Valid Values: Cell Barcode and DNA Insert, Sample Index and DNA Insert, DNA Insert, Sample Index, Cell Barcode

Description: Read 2 content description
Valid Values: Cell Barcode and DNA Insert, Sample Index and DNA Insert, DNA Insert, Sample Index, Cell Barcode

Description: A common term for all files belonging to the same cell or library. Provide a numbering of each library prep batch (can differ from encapsulation and sequencing batch)
Links samples to a specific local sequencer run. Can be string or 'null'
Total number of reads per sample. Integer
The tissue dissociation method used for scRNASeq or scATAC-seq assays
Valid Values: gentleMACS, Dounce, Enzymatic Digestion, Not Applicable

Description: Indicate if library preparation was based on revived frozen cells.
The method by which cells are isolated into individual reaction containers at a single cell resolution (e.g. wells, micro-droplets)
Valid Values: Microfluidics Chip, Droplets, FACS, Plates, 10x, Nuclei Isolation

Description: Number of cells loaded/placed on plates
Number of cells and number of nuclei input; entry format: number, number
Cell and transcript identifiers
DependsOn: UMI Barcode Offset, UMI Barcode Length, Median UMIs per Cell Number, Cell Barcode Offset, Cell Barcode Length, Valid Barcodes Cell Number

Length of cell barcode read (in bp): number
Number

Length of UMI barcode read (in bp): number
Number

Highly-multiplexed plate-based single-cell RNA-Seq assay
Unique cell barcode assigned to empty cells used as controls in CEL-seq2 assays.
Indicate if protein expression (EPCAM/CD45) positive/negative data  is available for each cell in CEL-seq2 assays

Attribute: Single Cell Dissociation Days from Index
Description: Number of days between sample for single cell assay was received in lab and when the sample was dissociated and cells were isolated [number]
The end of the cDNA molecule that is preferentially sequenced, e.g. 3/5 prime tag/end or the full length transcript

An oligo to which new deoxyribonucleotides can be added by DNA polymerase [SO_0000112]. The type of primer used for reverse transcription, e.g. oligo-dT or random primer. This allows users to identify content of the cDNA library input e.g. enriched for mRNA

A method for adding extra channels of information to cells by running single-cell gene expression in parallel with other assays [https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/pipelines/latest/feature-bc]

Unique ID for this feature. Must not contain whitespace, quote or comma characters. Each ID must be unique and must not collide with a gene identifier from the transcriptome [https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-gene-expression/software/pipelines/latest/using/feature-bc-analysis#feature-ref]
A set of known synthetic RNA molecules with known sequence that are added to the cell lysis mix
Valid Values: ERCC, Other Spike In, No Spike In, PhiX

Description: Median number of reads per cell. Number
Median number of genes detected per cell. Number
Number of sequenced  cells. Applies to raw counts matrix only.
Threshold for calling cells
Number of nuclei sequenced

Description: Median fraction of reads in peaks (FRIP)

Description: Median fraction of reads in annotated cis-DNA elements (FRIADE)
Non-PCR duplicate nuclear genomic sequence reads not aligning to unanchored contigs out of total reads assigned to the nucleus barcode
